notes: Public marketing routes expanded per IA spec (how-it-works, faq, privacy, terms).
App portal supports post-login role hint via ?loginRole=teacher|student.
SEO/public prerender snapshots generated at build-time from src/portals/public/publicContent.json.
Added react-helmet-async for public portal meta tags; HelmetProvider wrapped in src/main.jsx.
Added vite-plugin-sitemap to generate sitemap.xml and robots.txt at build.
Made public prerender generation idempotent with marker blocks in index.html.
Added app onboarding gateway: /app index redirects users with 0 memberships to /app/onboarding and users with multiple memberships (no explicit selection) to /app/SchoolSelect.
Public prerender snapshot now auto-hides when JS runs to avoid duplicate rendering for users; remains visible for no-JS crawlers.
